attributes.action: PM Theresa May to publicly condemn President Trump's ban on Muslim refugees
attributes.additional_details:
The PM has a duty to represent and act in the interests of all Britain's citizens, including its Muslim population, and must denounce such a blatantly Islamophobic and inhumane policy.
Moreover, it is outrageous that this executive order came on Holocaust Memorial Day. The PM must stand with Britain's Jewish community and condemn Trump's enacting a policy of hate on a day set aside to remind us of the horrors that hate can bring.
attributes.background: Theresa May has initially refused to condemn the shocking policy of Donald Trump to immediately ban refugees from seven majority-Muslim countries. Such an action stands completely at odds with a humanitarian and 'Global' Britain. The PM must publicly condemn this ban.
